SEARCH
Package server.Controller

Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
server.Controller.GameBoardController
public class GameBoardController extends Object
This Class is the controller for the GameBoard and its components LivingRoom and ItemBag

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoardController

      public GameBoardController(GameController gameController)
      Creates an instance of GameBoardController binding it with GameController which is the main controller
      Parameters:
      gameController - the instance of GameController to bind

  • Method Details

    • setPlayerNum

      public void setPlayerNum(int playerNum)
      Method that sets the number of players in the game
      Parameters:
      playerNum - a number between 2 and 4

    • getControlledGameBoard

      public GameBoard getControlledGameBoard()
      Returns:
      the controlled GameBoard

    • getControlledLivingRoom

      public LivingRoom getControlledLivingRoom()
      Returns:
      the controlled LivingRoom

    • gameBoardInit

      public void gameBoardInit()
      Begins the initialization of the GameBoard. Creates and binds a new instance of GameBoard, creates and fills the ItemBag, sets the LivingRoom also invoking the filling procedure and the first availability update on the LivingRoom's tiles.

    • PickManager

      public PlayableItemTile PickManager(int x, int y)
      Launches and controls the steps of the procedure that allows a Player to pick a PlayableItemTile from the LivingRoom
      Parameters:
      x - the "x" position of the PlayableItemTile to pick from the LivingRoom
      y - the "y" position of the PlayableItemTile to pick from the LivingRoom
      Returns:
      the chosen PlayableItemTile if the procedure is correct, otherwise null. The procedure is not correct when: (1) the chosen PlayableItemTile is not available (2) the chosen PlayableItemTile is available but not adjacent to a PlayableItemTile picked during the same turn by the same Player (3) there are no more PlayableItemTiles adjacent to a PlayableItemTile picked during the same turn by the same Player

    • checkTileAvailability

      private boolean checkTileAvailability(int x, int y)
      Launches the procedure to check if an ItemTile is available
      Parameters:
      x - the "x" position of the ItemTile
      y - the "y" position of the ItemTile
      Returns:
      true if it is available, false otherwise

    • checkTileAdjacency

      private boolean checkTileAdjacency(int x, int y)
      Launches the procedure to check if an ItemTile is adjacent to a previously picked PlayableItemTile
      Parameters:
      x - the "x" position of the ItemTile
      y - the "y" position of the ItemTile
      Returns:
      true if it is available, false otherwise

    • checkPickedTilesNum

      public boolean checkPickedTilesNum()
      Checks the number of PlayableItemTiles picked in the current turn
      Returns:
      true if the number is smaller than 3, false otherwise

    • livingRoomFiller

      public void livingRoomFiller()
      Method that fills the controlled LivingRoom with PlayableItemTiles picked from the Itembag. For every pair (x,y) checks if the corresponding cell in the LivingRoom is equal to null. If it is, picks a PlayableItemTile from the Itembag and puts it in the empty cell of the LivingRoom.

    • checkAdjacentAvailability

      private boolean checkAdjacentAvailability()
      Method that checks if at least one of the adjacent PlayableItemTiles is also available.
      Returns:
      true whether there is at least a PlayableItemTile adjacent and available, false otherwise

    • checkIfAdjacentTiles

      public boolean checkIfAdjacentTiles()
      Method that is executed at the beginning of every turn. It checks the presence of at least 2 adjacent PlayableItemTiles in the LivingRoom
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one PlayableItemTile with an adjacent ItemTile which is not null and which is not a NullItemTile, false otherwise
